ABOUT

OBJECTIVE

I am looking for An job's opportunity in Software Engineer or Web Developer at Junior Level that could allow me to earn experience and utilize my Problem-Solving Skills, Creative Ability and attention to detail to further develop my abilities working in the field of IT, CS and Data Science.

WORK PERMIT

| JUNE 2019 | ASSOCIATE | COMPUTER SCIENCE | CENTURY COLLEGE | MINNESOTA USA |

I have gotten GPA: 3.82 in CS Courses, Math and Science courses all grade A (Fall 2017 - SPRING 2019).

BIO

I was born in Laos, a small country and beautiful locates in southeastern Asia, and my second language is Chinese. In 2004, I studied first year in Lao university, I got a full Chinese Scholarship by exam, and went to study undergraduate in Architecture major in China university. After finishing bachelor degree and working as architect in China about 12 years, I decided to look for a new opportunity to explore the new experience for my life. In beginning, I came here for study English to improve my thirst language. Now I am an international student at Century College for computer science major. I really like to study in the U.S, especially in Minnesota’s Environment and living cost which allow me to live and study here. So, I plan to finish my four years bachelor degree with my favorite major. I think this major could provide many job’s opportunities and improve my life and family to be better in the future. This job’s opportunity would help me to move toward to my goal and I believe I have the necessary skills to succeed.

EDUCATION

| JUNE 2019 | ASSOCIATE | COMPUTER SCIENCE | CENTURY COLLEGE | MINNESOTA USA |

I have gotten GPA: 3.82 in CS Courses, Math and Science courses all grade A (Fall 2017 - SPRING 2019).

| JUNE 2010 | BACHELOR | ARCHITECTURE | SOUTH CHINA UNIVERSITY OF TECHNOLOGY | GUANGZHOU CHINA |

After I finish this major, I have worked as Achitect from Fall 2010 to Fall 2015)

Accomplishments

· C/C++: the first programming language I have learned for Programming Fundamentals course. C programming language lets me understand how CPU and memory work inside the computer, and how to handle the memory address, pointer, etc. C++ lets me enter to OOP and understand about data structure & algorithms. · Java: I have learned Object-Oriented Programming by Java. That lets me understand how important OOP in the real world. I practiced OOP by using Java in Eclipse build the GUI for implement assignment and side projects. · Python: I learned by self-teaching. It’s powerful, high efficiency and useful language in nowadays and the future. I learned it because I am interested in AI, Data science and new technology. So, I plan to learn machine learning, deep learning and neural network to prepare for AI in my future’s career. · Data structure & Algorithms: I was taught by using Java to implement them like LinkedList, Stack, Tree, Maps, sort, merger sort, etc. I also learn another language like Python and C++ to diversity and enhance my skill in Data structure and Algorithms. I found lots of examples of data structure & algorithms in books and online for practicing solving problem skills. · Database: learned by self-teaching, SQL is the first language that I used to handle objects in the database. I practice MySQL for my side project that let me get more understand about database. I also learned and practice some new database technology like Node.js C# .NET framework, MongoDB, etc. · JavaScript: learned by self-teaching, practiced by using its library and framework like JQuery, Angular.js and React.js, show in my personal website portfolio. I think it is easy to learn and to use in the web technology and another. · HTML5&CSS3: These web design technology like Bootstrap I used in website portfolio to show my works and side projects. I also used Photoshop & Illustrator to design web page. · Computer Aided design(CAD): I have an experience working with AutoCAD software before, I used ACAD to draw architectural planning and detail by using ACAD software.

COMMUNICATIONS & LEADERSHIP

· Communication & leadership: I like to meet and share Idea with new friends, classmate, colleague. I think Team work is the best way for efficiency working because easy communicate to work well together. I have participated many activities, social groups and clubs like: PTK, CS club, and International students club.
